author: Nim
title: Tokenized ADA for Yield Farming
description: Huge amounts are locked up in DeFi yield farms on Eth and BSC. They don't want to move to Cardano yet because of lesser yield opportunities.

assessments.note: The proposal is clear and precise on what its looking to accomplish in the world of yield farming. This is something that has had success in traditional finance and in the other crypto projects. Its a good idea to bring to cardano and will benefit everyone who is looking to hodl.
sounds a little like liqwid protocol we need quality and not quantity but if it is unique enough it could work
This Dapp is super but with my little brain its 2 early for this Dapp to work without other Dapps already in use.

There is no detailed development roadmap or project plan included in this proposal. Author does not clarify how this solution will drive value on Cardano. The community of ADA holders is not here to Yield Farm on BSC and pay fees in BNB.
This dApp is lacking all of the technical documentation needed to effectively address the challenge or even describe its product sufficiently.
Nothing about this proposal is clear. Is this on BSC or Cardano? what language is this dapp written in? where is the technical docs

This is by far the best proposal in this round of funding challenge. A Dapp which will not just create Synthetic Challenger but will also provide additional reward to all the Ada holders on and above normal returns via staking. it might double the staking reward with almost no risk which will attract many people to cardano.

Experience as described seems solid enough to accomplish the goal. The plan presented makes sense, in particular I like the idea of keeping a 1:1 ratio between ada and this yield token because it brings simplicity in managing the price and value.
the founder seems fairly competent but still need to build out a team by the sounds of it

Here unfortunatelly we have a little prob.As an idea it will work for sure.Check Binance smart chain and all the aggrogators they have like pancake bunny rewards are in Wbnb.It will work as an idea but here we dont have yet an exhange.And if we dont have an exhange that use leverage,how this WADA can work?   So for the idea i put 5/5.

The proposer's budget is not at all detailed and with no technical documentation, metrics or complete project plan this is a very early stage concept. Who will develop this dApp, in what language, where are their Github repos?
No technical docs, no milestones, no project roadmap, no benchmarks, no Plutus developer resource identified.
no detail in project plan, no technical docs, 50% of budget going to non-development activities, no dev resource highlighted.

Plan provided seems to be detailed and proposer seems to have adequate experience in software development, but product as revolutionary as this will need more than 2 hands and support from IOHK and Emergo.
The breakdown of how the money is to be used is especially helpful here and timelines on when artifacts can be expected provide the necessary insight into how this will move forward.
the basics are there but could be alot more detailed especially around the tokennomic aspects and the budgeting breakdown as only high level %s are given

There is no techical analysis that explains how the project will work.Only ideas(good ideas) but without the proper preparation i can not give my possitive vote.If something change i will come back and correct it.
Everything about this proposal is speculative and half-baked. The author needs to create a WP or technical documentation to describe the components of this dApp in detail.
nothing about this proposal is feasible. please review comments above where I describe in detail the lacking components of this proposal.

So many questions and so few answers is my takeaway from reviewing this proposal. A DeFi dApp needs to come more complete than this with technical docs, a complete plan, implementation strategy and metrics to back them.

the proposer has provided sufficient information to judge the feasibility of this project where if they manage to complete the project according to vision than it will change the ecosystem forever for good.

solution: A token with 1:1 convertibility with ADA, allowing holders to keep staking their underlying ADA while also yield farming using the tokens.
experience: I'm a web developer with 8+ years experience building apps in JS, Python and PHP. Currently also operating PHRCK stake pool in Philippines.
